sense.def:
To give one's attention to something
pomeni, da nekaj gledamo, poslušamo ali o tistem pazljivo razmišljamo.

seg.quote: When he felt he had their attention, he began.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is getting attention
se s tistim ukvarjamo.

Kadar človek
brings something to one's attention
ali
draws one's attention to something
na tisto nekoga opozori.

Kadar nekaj
attracts one's attention
ali
catches one's attention
človek tisto nenadoma opazi.

To pay attention to something
pomeni tisto gledati, poslušati ali opaziti.

seg.quote: There's far too much attention being paid to these hooligans.

sense.def:
Kadar vojaki
stand to attention
stojijo vzravnano s stopali skupaj in rokami ob telesu.
